relevantArticles.articleTitle: kvm创建快照和删除快照指令
relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 创建快照 ：virsh snapshot-create-as 【主机名】 【快照名】 virsh snapshot-create-as gongdear-kubernetes-master k8smaster-k8scertdone 查看主机的快照 ：virsh snapshot-list 【主机名】 virsh snapshot-list gongdear-kubernetes-master 删除主机的快照 ：virsh snapshot-delete 【主机名】 【快照名】 virsh snapshot-delete gongdear-kubernetes-master k8smaster-k8scertdone 恢复快照 virsh snapshot-revert 【主机名】 【快照名】 virsh snapshot-delete gongdear-kubernetes-master k8smaster-k8scertdone
